72138858.review:
Understandably, as someone who has clocked up roughly 8,500 hours playing the FM series thus far from CM00/01 to the current iteration, I'd like to think I know what makes a good Football Manager game and what has historically let the series down. FM20 does the best job of any instalment so far of improving and expanding on the good and dealing with the negatives.

The match engine is fantastic. Players move in a convincing way; stepovers, Cruyff turns, stop-and-go, all represented here in the best match engine to date. Yes the crowd animations are repetitive but you know what, if you want to play FIFA, go and play FIFA.

The IMMENSE scale of the game means you might feel overwhelmed by your responsibilities and the sheer amount of clicking you need to do to establish your latest season but please, friend, worry not! Along with all these new options comes a wealth of new staff responsibilities, and you can delegate or take charge at your leisure, Like to finalise signings but don't really care about the scouting side of things? Delegate it. Prefer to find those hidden gems yourself but couldn't care less about negotiating their contracts? Sure, delegate it. Want to keep an eye on your blossoming U23 side but the U18s are just too far off your radar right now? Guess what? Delegate it.

I haven't been this impressed with the advances in a Football Manager title since FM13, everything you can think of that would improve the series from FM19 is here. Data presentation is fantastic, player development and progression is as close to perfection as it could be. FM20 makes the complicated things seem simple and makes the simple things seem effortless. To me, this is now THE Football Manager title.

Simply put, FM20 is a defining moment in the history of Football Manager titles. Make no mistake, this one is a classic. Though you may not find the next Tonton Zola Mokouko sitting in Derby County's reserves, every story you do write for yourself on this genre-defining game will carry its own memories and legacy and surely that is the highest praise of all.

Ps. Match engine is still sometimes a bit of a joke

72565513.review:
Great game!: Like with every FM in the past year's i am really enjoying this game. 
And i definitely recommend this years version!
As Football Manager is a game that returns every year i am only going to name a few pros en cons i noticed in this years edition.

[h1]Pros[/h1]

[b] -Youth development center:
[/b] 
This years edition updated the youth development center, putting your B squad and under 19's in a new tab giving fast information on development of the players.  Also the staff tasks can be delegated so that your staff will send players on loan if that would benefit there development.
Also the youth intake is now more random (different dates instead of set dates for a country) making scouting more fun but also giving you more basic insights into your youth intake in the comming periode.


[b] -Clubvision
[/b] 
if you take over management of a club you will discuss and agree with the board to set a clubvision for the upcomming 5 years, this will be growing as you progress over the seasons, this gives you more  power as you can discuss the way you want to develop your team, but also will effect the team you might want to go to, as certain boards will prefere attacking football and some would prefere defending...   So dont play offensive attacking football if you agreed on a defensive strategy.


[b] -Players careerplanning
[/b] 
Same as setting a clubvision you now get to add a careerplanning as you discuss a contract with a player telling them not only there role for this season but also discuss there growthpath in order to develope them into regular players. This is a nice option if you focus on attracting young talents, but you will need to watch your setup, promissing 30 players a first 11 spot in the next 3 years might get some unhappy players in the seasons to come.


[b] -Overall playing experience
[/b] 
The overall playing experience has been improved making the look and feel alot more interactive, also by delegating tasks to your staff you get to play the game in a smooth way matching your playstyle. Basicly its an easy way to burn some playing hours :)

[h1]Cons[/h1]

[b] -Matchengine (and watching the game)
[/b] 
Like every year there are some small issues with the match engine making a few matches pretty frustrated.
overall i think alot of has been fixed but i have seen some weird things like:
1) two attacking players of the oponent running into each other (none of my players in sight) outside the 16 and i ended up getting a penalty againt me thanks to the VAR,   how?
2) a pure goal was made, the ball rolled back out of the goal keeper picked it up and the game went on like nothing happend.
Those are the two weirdes things in 100 hours of play so i dont really worry about it.


[b] -incorrect text (but this might be a language thing as i play with the game on dutch)
[/b] 
Every now and then there are speech options wich are incorrect, stating now that we are behing (eventhough we are in front)  or like stating they won there home game eventhough the first game was away..    It seems these issues do not effect the game and are pure some text issues, but its a small issue..

72322353.review:
Having started playing FM since 09, I've seen the series evolve over time. You can see that the creators have tried to add more and more content to make it as absorbing and immersive as possible. 

Unfortunately it's let down by being structurally broken for one simple reason. The tactics and match engine are appalling. It takes away from everything else, as you feel you can't link what you have instructed the team to do vs what they are doing, and more importantly, what the opposition do. 

If you press, they half-arse it, the opposition dance round you and score. If you sit back, the opposition pass round you and score. Your players can't or seemingly choose not to tackle, meaning the opposition will literally run by your defenders like they're not there whilst your player stands still and lets them by. Your team cannot mark an opposition player in any situation and do not win any defensive second balls

This would actually all be forgivable if the opposition suffered the same flaws as you. However, this is FM so they don't. If you decide to get everyone behind the ball because you're fed up of watching your team not even try to defend, then whoever you're playing will score multiple 25 yard strikes to the top corner - with no correlation to their long shots and technique stats. If you try and engage in any way, well whoever has the ball becomes Messi incarnate and will happily run past multiple defenders to score  - again, with no correlation to their dribbling and finishing. I won't mention your team's inability to finish clear and half chances vs the opposition for my own sanity

The game strikes me as the latest window dressing in a series that needs a fundamental overhaul

71089236.review: Rekabetin ne kadar önemli olduğunu bu seri ve Fifa serisi bize gösteriyor. Rakibiniz olmadığı için çay kaşığı ile ekleme yapılıyor oyuna. Oyuna o kadar az ekleme yapıyorlar ki en basitinden zamanında oynadığım Lma Manager' de stadyum yapma vardı. Üç boyutlu olarak görebiliyorduk mesela. Oyundaki yapay zeka felaket. Premier lig ve İspanya dışında bütün liglerde bu saçmalıklara rastlayabilirsiniz. Hele de Türkiye liginde durum daha da kötü. Galatasaray 18-20m Euro civarı transfer yapabiliyor oyuncu satmadan. Beşiktaş o kadar kötü ki küme düştüğünü bile gördüm. Fenerbahçe zaten Allah' a emanet. Trabzon ve Başakşehir dışında rekabetçi bir takım yok. Sezon başında istediğiniz bir Türk stoperin piyasa değeri 1m Euro civarı olmasına rağmen kulübü 7-8m Euro istiyor. Bir bakmışsınız aynı adam devre arası transfer döneminde 500k Euro' ya orta sıra takımına geçmiş. Maç içi saçmalıklarından bahsetmeyeceğim bile %70 top oynama yüzdesi, rakip kaleyi bulan 30 şut, rakip takım şutu 0 ama maçı kendi kalenize attığınız golle 1-0 kaybediyorsunuz, Çünkü hiç takılmadan gelmenize, iyi form grafiğine ve kondisyona rağmen oyun kazanmanıza izin vermiyor. Fifa' daki momentum gibi bir  şey var bunda da.  Alışkanlık olmasa alıp oynamayacağım ama 20 sene oldu neredeyse kurtulamadım şu lanet oyundan. 1/10.

I do recommend it, Football Manager is great, but I want to point out I don't recommend it more than 19, 18, or 17 - this has been my 25th year playing these games, I remember what I call the "jumps", the game leaping in progress in a year. I don't remember the last one however, nor do I see one coming any time soon.
This game maybe has a few new things, I'm sure if I left my review earlier I'd remember the differences. 

I would love to see two British greats, Sports Interactive and Total War's Creative Assembly (both parented by SEGA) to come together on the match engine and 3D representation - because the argument graphics don't matter because FM is a statistics game is really wearing thin when the match engine makes it appear that statistics don't matter anyway.

Not a very in depth review, just off the top of my head as Steam asked me.

73284832.review:
Как старый фанат данной серии игр, купил и эту часть.
Это было ошибкой. Вместо того, чтобы дать в полной мере насладиться игрой и управлением клубом, разработчики за каким-то хреном решили сделать игрокам "ЧЕЛЛЕНДЖ".
У тебя команда - победитель Лиги Чемпионов - играет с дворовой командой? Нет, тебе нужен ЧЕЛЛЕНДЖ!
Твои игроки будут колченогими ублюдками(они будут терять мяч на ровном месте, хаотично бегать по полю и творить прочее дерьмецо), в то время как соперник будет играть на уровне сильнейших клубов(от пездюка 18 лет получить с 30 метров? Легко. Старый солдат с колоссальным опытом в ПФЛ обведет полкоманды топовых защитников? Да запросто!). Может быть, тебе повезет и ты вылетишь из кубка в серии пенальти. Но шансы на победу не зависят от тебя - они зависят от того, решат ли разрабы, достоин ли ты? Да вряд ли. У тебя и так слишком дохрена титулов. А у них нет.

Накипело. С каждой частью все хуже и хуже.

Удалил нахрен. Впустую потраченные деньги. Игра просто душит.
Ради интереса решил проверить уходом в отпуск. Матч с соперником вида "типичный середнячок", звезд с неба не хватает, но и не мальчики для битья. Идут на третьем месте, среди всех остальных.
У меня - победная серия из 10 матчей. Уровень игроков несопоставим совершенно.
10 раз уходил в отпуск. 8 из этих матчей выигрывал середняк, два - моя команда.
Очень смешно. Проследуйте, пожалуйста, куда-нибудь подальше, господа разработчики. И скрипты свои туда же себе засуньте.
Когда ебешься с тактикой, изучаешь возможности игроков, анализируешь матчи соперника... а в итоге все приходит к тому, что победишь или проиграешь - за тебя решают разработчики с скриптами... Да идите вы лесом.

P.S. Коммент отредактировал, теперь он более цензурный. Но, надеюсь, разрабы пойдут, что в погоне за длинным фунтом двинулись они куда-то не туда.

I feel like every game is about outsmarting the Match Engine instead of executing a tactic and a team selection vs an opposing team. I don't feel like a football manager during the actual games, and the game has so far not provided me with any sense that I can have a real and sustainable effect on the outcome of games through "coaching".

Other than that it's important to note that the sooner you accept that you cant consider alone on goal as actual chances, the better for your own mental health. A tactic that creates a lot of alone on goal opportunities is a losing one.

Everything else is ok, and generally seem like improvements since the earlier versions. However I'd recommmend getting FM15 or similar if you want a better touchline experience.

73774279.review:
Sadly, I will have to give this game the thumbs down, even if I will keep playing the Football Manager iterations for years to come. It does a great job to represent the manager experience and gives you so much control over the contemporary football.

This is why I will outline what I DID NOT like in this game, and if you feel in a similar way, you should wait for a sale or never buy it.

1. The game is heavily biased towards managing top level clubs. They always have a good system in place, suffer minimal injuries and even if they do, 90% of the time have equal subs for the players.

2. If you play anything but a top level club, you can easily forget holding on to your best regens and existing youngsters. Either a top club will snipe them or constantly unsettle them to a point when they will seek to actively disrupt your team, training, and outright refuse to do their job on the pitch (like a top level goalscorer clearly refusing to score on an open goal on purpose due to poor morale, or constantly missing from training).

3. The game encourages extremely heavy savescumming. Why?

3.1. You will suffer so many silly defeats after outplaying the opposition for the entire game (my worst case was 30 shots, 16 on goal, and lost to a single shot on goal by the opponent in the 91st minute).
3.2. You will get many injuries, often gamebreaking, it is insane. You may have top model professional 20-stat physios and you will still get a few injuries a week, ranging from very light (1-3 days) to losing a player for 2 or more months for no apparent reason. In order to avoid them, you need to save the game every odd day and reload as necessary. It is one of the most common things to suffer at least 2 injuries coming up to a crucial game, be it for a championship, or a cup - 90% of the time taking out your best players. I am almost positive it is scripted and if you are a smaller team or a weaker side, can destroy your progress in the league for months.

4. The game still has an unfixed exploit that allows players to cheat in millions (not using the in-game editor) which makes in-game player standings irrelevant.

As such there are times, sometimes spanning hours at the time,  that the game turns into an exercise of frustration and will force you to either ragequit, scream or punch something to relieve your frustration. That is not ok for a game that presents itself as a complete manager experience. For the next iteration, I seriously hope they will tone down at least the injuries that people can get. And before people start citing injury proneness, etc. I had an 18yo goalkeeper with 2 injury proneness get destroyed for 2-3 months in the first week of training. Bad luck you would say? Time to restart the game? Why did I waste 3 hours on a legit, uncheated, non-savescum save then?!

And if you are still not convinced - try a legit game with Gateshead from Vanarama North. It is the most challenging to beat without savescumming, and the most rewarding one.

Oyun beni öyle sarmıştı ki okulumu bile aksatıyor, oyunun başından bir türlü kalkamıyordum. O oyun benim ilk ve son deneyimim olmuştu. Ve geldik bugüne... Ne zamandır kafamda yeniden başlama düşüncesi var idi ama bir fırsat bekliyordum. En sonunda beklediğim fırsatı yakaladım ve oyunu indirimle satın aldım.

Eveeet nerede kalmıştık? Yıllar önceki deneyimimi doğal olarak unutmuş, kendimi oyunun bu kadar fazla detayının içinde kaybolmuş gibi hissettim. Alışmam çok zaman aldı ama geçmiş tecrübemle üstesinden geldiğimi düşünüyorum. Kariyerime bu sefer tuttuğum takım Fenerbahçe ile değil, o zamanlar henüz oyunda olduğunu bile düşünmediğim memleketimin takımı GMG Kastamonuspor ile başladım. Öncelerde hazırlık maçlarında gelen geçeni tokatlamış "hehe  ne varmış bunda canım çözdüm ben bu işi!" diye havalara girmiştim. Ancak lig başlayıp asıl maçları oynadığımızda bir güzel yanıldığımı anladım. Yaptığınız her detay, her antrenman, oyuncularla girdiğiniz her diyalog, her röportaj oyununuza etki ediyor. Her şeyi ince eleyip sık dokumak gerekiyor. Her takıma ayrı bir taktik, ayrı bir strateji gerekiyor. Ben daha ilk sezonumu bitirdim. Ligte ortalarda bitirmem beklenirken canım memleketimin takımını 3. lüğe taşıdım. Umarım bu performans devam eder şampiyon oluruz!

Uzun lafın kısası ben sadece Fm 2013 oynamış biri olarak bu oyunu sevdim. Ha serinin her sene çıkan oyunlarını alıp her sene tüm seriyi oynamış olanlar pek farklılık yok üzerine birkaç yenilik eklemişler diyebilir onlara bir şey diyemem. Benim oynadığım 2013 oyununda oyuncular 3D maç izlediğimde buzda paten yapar gibi hareket edip, saçma sapan hareketler yapıyorlardı. Sırf o günleri bile hatırlamak acaba bu oyunda da aynımıdır, alsam mı acaba dedirtti ama çok şükür eskisi kadar kötü değil bence 3D maçlar. Genel olarak ben oyunu çok beğendim ve bu bataklığa tekrar düştüm. İndirimde almayı düşünenler varsa bir şans verebilir bu oyuna. 

Son olarak 37 Dep Dep ulan!

73171895.review:
This game (and the games before it) converted me into a football fan, and I had barely any appreciation of sports before that point.

Football Manager is, in gaming terms, like a grand strategy RPG. You have the grand strategy element of heaps and heaps of numbers going up and down and the initial confusion of understanding what any of them mean, as well as being able to play for 400 hours (like I have) and realise you understand absolutely nothing about the game, and still having that creeping feeling that you really don't know what you're doing.

The RPG element comes from your players. Each of your players has their own wants and needs, and you have to balance your match day squad as best as possible. It's not just a case of "who's best at what" (although sometimes it can be) - you might need to settle a disgruntled player, or give one of your younger players a chance to shine and get some experience in the first team.

It's hard to show what the appeal of the FM series is unless you really sink your teeth into it. I can honestly say I get ridiculously immersed in this game. You experience the highs and lows of your labour, cringing when your team has an awful defeat and cheering when they do well. Were you responsible? Was it just RNG? Who knows, but it's fun, isn't it? Trying to work out what's actually you and what is just smoke and mirrors is part of the fun.

What I'm trying to say is, even if you're not a fan of football and sport, if you have an interest in grand strategy or complex RPGs you may just appreciate the incredibly diverse and immersive game that has the potential to grab you here. For me, players like Alessandro Rossi, Hendrick Weydandt and Luismi are burned into my brain, and I've gotten a brand new appreciation for the complexity and nuance that the sport of football has. This IS the beautiful game, but not as you know it.

Cet opus est celui sur lequel j'ai passé le plus de temps à ce jour, pas difficile quand on sait que le premier FM que j'ai acquis n'était autre que le 18 (j'ai acheté un PC en 2018). 
Le jeu est plaisant à jouer et il n'est pas compliqué de se donner un objectif avec telle ou telle équipe, d'avoir un projet comme l'aurait une équipe IRL. 
Cependant, comme certains l'ont indiqué dans les commentaires et pas que, le jeu réserve toutefois des petits problèmes de logique et de règlement. 
- Les faux hors-jeu : Souvent cités, bien que pas souvent rencontrés -soyons honnêtes-, ces petits bugs pourraient s'avérer coûteux pour l'équipe et la saison car, parfois lorsqu'un joueur marque et qu'un joueur est hors-jeu, même si ce dernier ne touche pas le ballon ou ne fait pas action de jeu (parfois il est loin du ballon), le jeu va refuser le but pour cause du soi-disant "hors-jeu" du joueur, parfois même il n'y a aucun joueur hors-jeu. 

- Les joueurs du club eux-mêmes : Je trouve, nous trouvons je dirais, que les joueurs se plaignent beaucoup trop facilement, j'ai des joueurs qui n'ont pas le niveau pour être titulaire, qui sont des joueurs de rotation, qui me demandent de "plus jouer" alors qu'ils jouent 1 match sur 3 au minimum.

- Les étoiles lunatiques des joueurs : C'est un problème secondaire et "inoffensif" puisqu'il n'est que visuel mais, je trouve ça embêtant que les étoiles des joueurs changent lorsque le joueur manque ne serait-ce que deux matchs, un joueur va voir ses étoiles de potentiel passer de 5 à 4, ses étoiles de niveau actuel passer de 4 à 3 juste car il a manqué 2 matchs voir parfois qu'un...

Bref, là tout de suite je n'ai pas l'inspiration et le souvenir d'autres problèmes même s'il y en a, ceci dit je joue au jeu et je l'aime, je le conseille évidemment car le seul réel bug ici c'est le premier et il n'arrive que rarement.

FM 20 is the alarming case, when SI releases two versions of the the game consecutively worse than the previous one. FM 19 was an attempt to overhaul tactical side of the game and quite expectedly many changes didn't go too well, resulting in inconsistent Match Engine, where player simply can't see results of his choices, because intructions fail to apply. It was understandable and I hoped these issues would be fixed next year. They were not, in fact they got even worse.

Completely unrealistic chance coversions, GKs never following instructions, wingers mindlessly hitting balls when there are two open teammates in the box, nerfed strikers, passive counter mentality, you name it. Adding this to already existing problems like neverchanging interviews, interactions with useless options, unbalanced transfer market, stale world simulation and overestimated reputation effect, and you get the clear sign that SI have stopped paying attention to players feedback. We don't really need loan manager or any other fancy roles, when DoF is still useless, here's your example

Now don't get me wrong, I'm still a fan and FM is my favourite addiction, but I see 19 as a failed step forward and 20 is worse than 19. I'll keep playing, but I'm concerned that series are going backwards, and devs are applying cosmetic changes to a stale team management, in the meantime messing up match engine more and more. Eventually this might hurt them

Cutting to the chase, if you pick top club and apply plug and play tactics, you'l have a blast and win things. If your FM experience is playing for underdogs, developing club and tinkering with tactics and scouting, you might be up for a frustrating experience

73906560.review:
This probably my favorite sports manager game that I've played. It offers lots of depth while still being highly approachable for a beginner and has a great UI that's easy to navigate. I'm not a huge soccer head, I don't follow the pro sport, but I still loved this game.

Pros:
-The UI is great. It's very easy to find the important information without it looking cluttered. Everything is categorized, and once you get into it everything is intuitive. And if you are a big stats head you can still go and find pages full of numbers to go through if you wish.
-The depth of teams is great, I haven't run a game with every major league, but I've been running just the America's and the loading times have been fairly quick. I love the ability to play with and control development leagues, something that you often don't have control over in other sports management games.
-You get to watch the game play out and have a lot of freedom in terms of strategical adjustments at any point during the game. You can also speed up or slow it down depending on what you want.
-Contract rules and etc or faithful to the actual real leagues.
-Stuff like press interviews or talking to players or training schedules can be fully controlled or delegated to other staff depending on how involved you want to be. This makes element makes the game easily approachable to new players by cutting down on stuff you have to manage while also still allowing more veteran players full freedom and control.

Cons:
-Watching the game live is cut into highlights. This means that you don't truly get to watch the whole game. I feel like I personally enjoyed the balance of gametime but I can see how some people could be annoyed that they don't get to see everything because that can affect decision making.
-There are minor unintuitive things, but nothing that hinders actual gameplay, and it can all be googled and easily figured out from there.

Overall, as mentioned earlier this is probably my favorite sports simulator game so far. Imo the UI is much more approachable than the OOTP baseball games while offering comparable depth. I've so far only played the main game/league system, but it has been everything I wanted in a sports manager game. I don't tend to like multiplayer in these games because it tends to get min-max, but I'll probably check out the fantasy/making your own team single player campaign later. Highly satisfied with this game and I give it my highest recommendation for anyone who like sports simulator games.

Rating: 10/10

自己看球也11年了，算半个老球迷，记得第一次接触fm是fm2011，当时看球不久，一进游戏就惊呆了，竟然能有把足球世界描绘得如此生动真实的游戏，然后就玩的一发不可收，也通过这个游戏掌握了许多足球知识以及了解到足球许多暗面的内容，比如讨好经纪人有多么重要，回购条款有多么舒服等等。一入宫门深似海，之后我又去玩了以前的cm0304、fm2006、fm2007等等，都体验到了不少乐趣（话说cm0304真的经典）。说回fm2020，自己白嫖了这么多年，不入个正对得起制作组吗？fm2020基本没让我失望，足球世界被呈现得更加细腻，最大的感受便是职工工作的细化，什么技术总监、营养师这些职业以前是没有的，而且对球员的状态描绘更加细致，呈现信息更加多什么的，言而总之，味儿还是那个味儿。但fm2020我玩着不舒服的地方也不少，比如现在系统的过度复杂化其实并没有提升玩家的游玩感受，由于要素的叠加，我相信玩家不会愿意一打开某个页面就是铺天盖地的细小文字，可能我比较懒，实在是没兴趣了解全部的机制；本作球员伤病设置问题严重，一个球员动不动就伤，尤其是两个边路，伤的那叫一个起劲，你比赛受伤也就算了，关键你训练场也天天受伤，搁着在训练场斗殴呢；这作的进球概率我觉得很迷，不知道是不是我战术的原因，反正单刀就没进几个，各种保姆球、奶奶球再厉害的前锋都能踢丢，真的服了，远射、头球也太容易进了，人人都是我罗嗷，而且引擎万年不变，这点我觉得要喷，引擎用了快10年，升级也升了，但我感觉流畅度反而没有入坑的fm2011高，以前动画里还有像布兰科蛙跳、马赛回旋等骚操作，现在的比赛画面就是单纯的踢来踢去、射门、头球，动作就很僵硬，有时还会闪现，这会让游戏体验少了很多乐趣！！！
自己算是fm系列老粉丝，个人认为最喜欢最经典的还是fm2011和fm2012(cm0304也算，就是太老了)，我是皇马球迷，开档必选皇马，这次一开档又拿了联赛欧冠，曾经的快乐又回来了，总之真的感谢fm系列这些年来带给我的感动，也希望这个系列能跨出现有的格局继续进步！hala madrid！

71909991.review:
I used to buy FM every year since CM93.  Nowadays I only buy FM every other year because of the minor improvements and I always wait for the summer sale, not because I'm tight but because most of the problems have been ironed out by then.  This year, as always, there is a new look and feel to FM, it has taken me about 40 hours to get used to it but I have to say, I like it, it feels more immersive, you feel closer to your players with better interactions than previous versions, they've actually put some new text choices in to things like the "Press Conference" amongst other things and I'd say its about time too.
The thing that really immerses me in the game is the 3D Match Engine, for me, its the part where you get to see all your hard work pay off (or fail) and unfortunately, there isn't much of an improvement in that regard.  Its ok, as it was last year and the year before but it could really do with being better quality than it is.  Don't get me wrong here, I love FM20 but you would think that 3-4 years down the line, it might actually look a bit more improved than it is.
The other thing that irks me, and I'm sure, many others is that on release, FM always has many problems, bugs, errors etc..  They have a whole year to get it right, why do they release a game at +£40 and then take 6 months to make it playable?  It makes people mad every year, with the money they suck out of us each year, you'd think that SEGA/FM would offer a more polished product on release.  I'd happily pay full price every year if there were improvements that worked out of the box.
That said, I'm happy with my £20 purchase and I like the new layout, FM20 is a good game (now) and well worth the price, it'll give any football fan many hours of replayable headaches and nightmares, just like real football.

71634696.review:
It is almost depressing to see that every year Football Manager does not adapt from its mechanic of guess tactics, which may see your team steam roll over five to six teams and then suddenly strike a crashing drop for the remainder of the season, not giving you any real clues as to why this is happened.

There is no argument that the game is perfect for the football fan who enjoys being drenched in a vast pool of stats and has hours to spend, watching twenty-two dots kick a football about, and at the same time never really understanding why player X is doing Y and whey team A is losing by three goals to team B, even though team A where champions  the previous season.

However, for the casual player, and still a football fan, the game probably seems it uses RNG mechanics to the extreme, which drives them to scroll the internet for hours, looking for answers as to why a tactic isn't working or their best striker isn't scoring, etc. only to find out the information they collect does not work for their team save.

A nice additional feature to see in the game would be an in-depth tutorial system -  not just the small induction boxes you see when selecting "no" to experienced - but a guide to help those who required it to better understand what they should focus on. If Sports Interactive were to implement this type of tutorial it would make life as a junior football manager bearable, especially for the casual few.

71482596.review:
[url=https://steamcommunity.com/id/tleung/recommended/624090]关于FM系列的上手教程，可以看看我FM2018的评论，全版本通用。[/url]

FM2020与前面最大的区别 

[h1]比赛时的机制[/h1]
虽然首发被诟病的踢边网，单刀不进（电脑也不进，哈哈），被绝杀等，各种奇怪的输球，不再以前一样足球跟乒乓球一样在人身上弹来弹去，球的运动在场面上更舒服，改进了2019疯狂底线角球的问题。

[h1]战术上的改进[/h1] 一些特别夸张的阵型（神阵）相比之前少了很多，战术的针对性设置需要更多的解读对手，及时调整很重要，不然容易被绝杀。
如果你没买FM2019，那么恭喜你跳过了场面近代最差的一代，阵型和战术都很局限，相当平淡。

[h1]单刀[/h1]
实际上真正的足球比赛单刀也是很不好进的，球员的镇定和技术不高的话，就算出现了机会也不一定进，而还好电脑和你一样，这也是2020和之前最大的区别，比赛更刺激，单刀机会更多。

73663572.review:
从2014开始玩，几乎每一代都几百小时，这一次终于开始不玩阿森纳，现在玩切尔西。只用核武看对方球员数值，不改球员数值，不乱砸钱买明星球员，想感受一个更真实的足球世界。谈谈体会。
玩这个游戏，心态很重要，开档切尔西，两个赛季第四，说成绩确实不咋地，而且两次被绝杀印象深刻，一次欧冠半决赛，被利物浦赛拉赫95分钟绝杀，一个弧线球吊门；另一次是打阿森纳，一个足总杯，就跟前几天真实比赛一样，我全场坎特死盯奥巴梅杨，几乎防得他评分6.0分，对方教练死活不换下去，结果第93分钟，悲剧了，角球一个头球，我就看到祖玛、坎特都在顶都顶不过个美羊羊，气得要咱电脑。
不过后来想想，这不就是足球的魅力么，你永远也不能把控偶然性，你能做的只能是尽可能安排合理的战术，最大程度发挥自己球员优势，最大限度限制对手发挥，也许你的安排能让你的球队从原先30%的获胜可能，变成99%的可能，这就是你教练的水平，但最后那个1%，你真的没办法把控。
另外，我建议不要去下什么神阵，一般电脑半个赛季就会适应，然后你就开始进攻便秘，我现在每场比赛都选择完整比赛，你可以看到场上每个球员的位置，在比赛时多按空格暂停，看看球员的走位，看看哪里是空档，想想怎么设置球员角色可以让他出现在那个空位，如何把对方的防守球员骗出来。
我比较喜欢中场后插上远射，比较喜欢中路直塞打身后，不喜欢无脑传中，现在的战术设置基本实现了我的想法，齐耶赫真香，158CA照样一赛季助攻20+传球15+。所以不是什么速度18加速18射门18就是好球员，要根据战术设置安排，每次看到齐耶赫销魂的左脚抽传，边路奥多伊插上远门柱破门……实在太爽了。
总之，这绝对是款好游戏，唯一美中不足，它可能无法实现我的一些关于足球战术的一些更个人的想法，比如，瓜迪奥拉的边后卫内收，直塞传身后，伪边锋套边（德布劳内）低平球传后点，这个战术怎么都打不出。希望下一代的低平球传中就真的是低平球。

FM2020 is a nice game with great improves comparing with FM2019.

Anyway, this game stills stuck in old IA defects (I mean, like the previous versions).

For example, you are going to play a very important game in the Champions League, and suddenly all your team gets injuries. All season without bad injuries and suddenly you can't play with ur prefer players. 
Right now, I'm playing with SL Benfica and going to play against Arsenal in the Quarter-finals of the Champions League, and I get FIVE players injuries in the last two weeks: 4 of them are players from my starting team, including mine goalkeeper! Arsenal has zero injuries. I don't know how this can be called "realistic". 
For FM2020, playing with a Portuguese team against Mahrez, Ozil, Aubameyang, and Lacazete it's not enough, they need injurie half of your team...! What a j-o-k-e.
If you are comfortable in your national league (1st) and you want to make a good CL, this can be a lost season. Saying in another way, losing my precious time. 

You can say all these injuries it's "bad luck", but we all know it's not. This happens frequently in the biggest season games. It's basically the IA being biased in a very silly way and calling you retarded...  I play this kind of games since CM and can easily identify some patterns.

For sure I could say more things about FM2020, some positive and others negative, but the way they use AI to bias the game it's already enough to understand what you can expect.

72345903.review:
Что ж, познакомился я с данной серией ещё в далеком 2015 году, и для меня данная серия настоящим откровением.

Начну издалека, для меня, знакомство с футсимами началось с FIFA 06 с модом на РПЛ (любителям группы Ленинград отдельный привет), затем были PES 08 и 09 на вторую плойку. Далее долгое время я скептически относился к футбольным симуляторам, ибо по сути своей один и тот же продукт каждый год продавался как новая игра (любителям последних фиф пламенный привет). И вот, после достаточного простого геймплея ФИФА и ПЕС, я столкнулся с FM. После того как я первый раз запустил игру меня охватила настоящая паника, что делать, как и зачем, но это и подогрело мой интерес к данной игре. 
Шаг за шагом я начинал разбираться в механиках, смысле и структуре данной игры. Какой же была моя радость, когда мне предоставилась возможность сыграть не только за гранды нашего футбола, но и за самые маленькие провинциальные команды.

По итогу мнение у меня сложилось неоднозначное, с одной стороны это очень качественный продукт в плане проработки, наполнения и реализма, а с другой из года в год разработчики не дают игрокам каких-либо кардинальных изменений ограничиваясь лишь небольшими изменениями и дополнениями.

В целом, игру могу смело рекомендовать тем, кому приелись ФИФА и ПЁС, однако стоит запостись терпением и временем, чтобы полностью разобраться и понять что к чему в данной игре

72612016.review:
FIFA20经理模式玩家，一开始看不上实况的比赛画面和UI，夏促入手，被FM的细致、真实性和全面的联赛数据所吸引，这是是经营类游戏足球爱好者没法拒绝的一款游戏，它的优点也是市面上任何足球游戏都做不到的，毕竟科乐美和EA还在那争版权呢，而我已经可以在FM玩到英乙之下的联赛球队了。
通过爆棚小组里大佬做的补丁，FM整体体验大有改善。当然缺点还是有的，FM的画面和UI在玩过之后比较能接受，反而系统局实在是有点恶心，门框VAR失位半场没有镜头等等，导致我一度不愿意进去看比赛画面。可能足球游戏就是避免不了开发商所设计的动态平衡，EA科乐美同样如此。
除此之外——VAR is shit,它过于干扰游戏的顺畅性。
现实里，曼城的欧冠禁令今天被解除，一开始我也没觉得真的会实行，又不是电话门这类轰动的丑闻，金元足球完全可以轻松解决。
但是在英超尾声，有的球迷还在为自己的球队争五熬夜看球，就这样省略过去这件事实在是有点不当人。

72420848.review:
I like this game a lot. I normally play fifa career mode but a friend of mine recommended this game. So I give it a try and I love it, its so more detailed than your average fifa career mode. Like in fifa you can get the best players in the world in a small team within 2 a 3 years. But in here it's more logical because in real life it is also not possible so it is in this game. I have some + and - for this game.

Positives:
+ More Realistic than other football games
+ You can see your players grow within the season and how you can improve their qualities
+ Your staff is beter than fifa because they can help you with beter player scouting or let you know how your loan players doing by their club
+ The game has nice details in how to buy a player or loan and what the player wants in there contract when your are negotiating with there manager
+ The prices of players fluctuate a lot if they preform good or bad
+ You can see how your youth team is doing and who is ready for the next step in the club
+ One of my favorite things that fifa should have inplanmented also that you can play online career with your friends in a competition 

Negatives:
- The game has no background music or something so if your alone it's pretty quiet 
- they got no license for some club badges/kits and names so it's pretty weird that your favorite club doesn't have their kit/badge
- You can't play the matches by yourself so you have to rely on the team performance 
- there is a ingame editor so you can cheat, but that isn't fun at all luckily you can turn it off if you wanted too

There are a lot of other things you can do in this game. But I can't name them all. So should I buy this game yes or no? Well my answer is yes, from my prespections on what is more fun football manager or fifa career I would say this it's so more detailed than the fifa games. I don't know about the previous games so I can't judge them on this game. Also about the licenses there are some mods where you can have the real names/badges of the club so don't worry about that. I hope my review help you guys a lot better of buying this game I should warn you that this game can get some discounts so you should wait till it is in the sale. I got it with a 50% discount.

71828571.review:
I waited a very long time between games to try a new FM; my last game was FM15, which I got a lot of time out of.

I feel like a lot of the changes that have occurred since then have been to the detriment of QoL, and a lot of the interfaces are now more obtuse to navigate.  I also feel that the tactics screen and sliders and so-forth are less impactful on play than they perhaps have been in FM generations past, but that may be because the interface changes just don't sit well with me.  So much of this game feels like changing a winning formula not for the sake of change, but to try to attract new players to the game as if a slightly more modern tactics screen and a less functional scouting page would entice new people to play a very autistic spreadsheet simulator game.  

The only reason I don't regret my money spent per se is that now seeing my investment in this game as a waste of money, I've begun to move on from these infinite-replayability games that don't accomplish anything but suck away precious time in my life from doing things that are actually enriching or enjoyable.  In a roundabout way, thank you, SI.

FM在外人看来只不过是枯燥的文字和数据，但是，在我们眼中，它是一个梦想家的游戏，饱含着玩家对足球这项运动的热爱和梦想。
在这个游戏里，你可以实现一个普通球迷对俱乐部的几乎一切想法和期望，可以用自己的方式成就球队，成就球员，成就自己。你可以真的你行你上，带着喜欢的豪门冲击三冠王，或者带一只低级别球队摸爬滚打，争取节节高升，你可以当一个人贩子，低买高卖，或者当个恋童癖，养一群亲儿子。你可以事无巨细，事必躬亲，也可以啥都交给职员，当个吃瓜教练.....
我玩FM也很多年了，一台电脑，一个保温杯，一本笔记本。从不度假，从不SL，每场赛前研究对手，针对性的设置战术，买了许多足球书籍学战术，重要比赛还记点笔记。我曾摩拳擦掌，然后连续三年倒在欧冠决赛，记得第三年点球输给马竞，我跪在椅子上的动作，像当年的穆里尼奥一样。也曾在英超最后一轮，靠鲁本·内维斯一支穿云箭绝杀利物浦夺冠，终场哨声一响，挥着拳头，欣喜若狂，恨不得跑到阳台像小李子那样大喊一声“I am the king of the world!”。曾经带队多年，因为和董事会的分歧，愤而辞职，结果看到球队几十个职员和我一起辞职，感动得热泪盈眶。看着自家青训小将表现出色，会露出慈父般的微笑；有时球队表现太差，气得捶桌子，恨不得中场休息把11个人全换了......这些真实的喜怒哀乐，是别的游戏没法给的，这也正是足球经理的魅力所在，这是足球，这是另一段人生。
这一代可以说是近些年最好的一代了，可以说是集大成之作。缺点嘛，一是单刀经常打不进，脑子里全是詹俊老师关于本特克的那句名言[spoiler]  CTMD本特克，早早的推空门不就完了吗  [/spoiler]，不过正式版出来以后似乎好了许多，我带阿森纳22/23赛季霍兰德各项赛事加起来进了56个球。二是边锋不会传中，有些时候边锋和边后卫中了邪一样，前赴后继把球带到底线一脚打在边网上，这要让莫耶斯来玩不得急死他？？
不过总的来说，瑕不掩瑜。打开足球经理，想象自己西装革履，站在球场中央，闻见青草的味道，小伙子们站在那你旁边，你环顾四周，向球迷们鼓掌致谢，看台上的球迷们山呼海啸，唱着为你编写的球迷歌曲，我想，没有比这更好的了。


——————————————————————————————————————--
如果你不是一个想象力20的人，请至少自备球员头像包，队徽包，2D球衣包，3D球衣包，真实奖杯图片包等，找不到这些补丁的新教练们可以私信我。

65297181.review:
Geçen seneki incelememde yazdığım gibi yine oyunun bu 2 senedir artarak devam eden fiyat politikasından başlayalım. 2019'dan önce yıllarca FM’yi ön siparişe özel indirim fırsatlarıyla 50-60 TL'ye aldım. Fakat bu 2 yıldır eski oyunculara indirim fırsatı vermedikleri gibi (Önceden bir önceki oyunun sahibi olan oyuncular ön siparişte %25 ekstra bir indirim kazanır ve oyun o zamanlar zaten ucuz olduğu için yeni oyun daha da ucuza alınırdı.) bir de oyunun bu seneki fiyatı 199 TL oldu. AAA bi oyun fiyatı yani. Maç motoru harici grafiksel içeriğin bulunmadığı ve sadece yazılardan oluşan bir oyunu 199 TL'ye satmak nedir amk? Bir de bu kadar paraya bu oyunu sattıkları halde hala lisanssız ligler, oyuncular falan var. Oyuna bir sürü grafik eklentisi vb. yüklemekle uğraşıyorsun.

Oyun bu kış indiriminde 134 liraya indirildi, bir önceki oyunun fiyatı ise 180 lira, Football Manager 2018'in ise "İNDİRİMSİZ" fiyatı 120 liraydı ki o zaman ön siparişte eski oyunculara yapılan %25 indirimle daha da ucuz oluyordu. 2 senedir bu oyunun fiyatı 2 katına çıktı. Grafiksel içeriğin bulunmadığı ve sadece yazılardan oluşan bir oyun bu ama AAA oyun fiyatına satılıyor. Buna rağmen bu oyunu hala hiç itiraz etmeden alan koyun sürüsü bi kitle var. Hadi yeni nesil oyuncular eski oyunların fiyatını bilmez de yıllarca bu oyunu oynayıp indirimle 70-80 liraya hatta daha bile ucuza ön siparişle alanlar nasıl hala bu oyunu alıyor anlamak güç. Önceden oyunu sürekli ön siparişle alırken geçen seneki oyunu mayıs ayında Voidu indirimlerinde 62 liraya aldım. Bu sene hala almadım ve almayı da düşünmüyorum o yüzden deneyip yorum yazmak için ücretsiz oynamadan faydalandım.

Neyse oyunun içeriğinden bahsedelim biraz. Hani bu 199 liralık bi oyun ya, baya şey sunmaları lazım sonuçta önümüze dimi? Bakıyorsun hiçbir şey yok. Elde var sıfır. Bir önceki seneye oranla geliştirilen hiçbir şey yok. Yine aynı tas aynı hamam olarak sunulmuş. Her sene transfer güncellemesi eklenerek yeni oyun diye satılıyor bu oyun. Hayır madem bu kadar zam yaptınız bari kandırmak için birkaç yenilik getirin. Transfer güncellemesini yeni oyun olarak sunuyorlar.

Oyun içeriğiyle ilgili en sinir bozucu şey maç motoru herhalde. Maç motoru yıllardan beridir gram gelişme gösteremediği gibi tam tersi geriye bile gitti. VAR senaryoları yine aynı geçen seneki gibi birkaç senaryo üzerinde tasarlanmış. Onları izleyince maçlarda ne olacağını tahmin edebiliyorsunuz. Goller ve kaçan gol pozisyonları ve diğer önemli pozisyonları her sene olduğu gibi yine önceden ne olacağını tahmin ederek izliyoruz zaten. Bunları bildiğimiz için oluşan pozisyon için de bu gol olur bu gol kaçar diyebiliyoruz maça bakarken. Geniş özette maç izlemek tam bir işkence. Bire bir pozisyonlarda tonla gol kaçıyorsunuz, buna karşılık rakipte böyle bir şey tabi ki yok. Bir pozisyona giriyorlar ve o da gol. Biz 30 pozisyona girip direkleri döverken, rakip elini kolunu sallayıp bir pozisyonda gol buluyor. Artık klasikleşti, bari bu saçmalığı değiştirin. Bu durum artık senelerdir Football Manager serisinin demirbaşı.

Daha ilk kariyere girmemle sakatlıklar gene başladı. Hayır fizyoterapistlerim de kötü değil ki, nasıl oluyor bu? Hepsi en az 4-4.5 yıldız olan fizyoterapistler. Demek ki hiçbiri bir işe yaramıyor. Haftada 1 maç temposuyla bile sağlık merkezine girince tüm oyuncularda “Yüksek sakatlık riski” görüyorsunuz. Antrenmanlara rejenerasyon özelliği var, işe yaradığına kendimizi inandırarak kullanıyoruz işte. Geçen sene yoğun maç temposunda sakatlıklar yükseliyordu, şimdi sezon başlamadan ilk devreyi kapatıyorlar.

Bu diğer antrenörler içinde geçerli. Kondisyon antrenörleri 5 yıldız olur, oyuncular yine çabuk yorulur. En iyi topla oynama ve hücüm antrenörleri getirirsin sonra yine defanstan çıkarken pas atma dediğin stoper karşı kaleye saçma sapan isabetsiz paslar atar, şut çekme dediğin oyuncu orta sahadan şut çeker veya forvet kaleciyle karşı karşıya kalınca topu taca atar. Bir de özellikle ben antrenörlerin iş yükünü hafif veya orta olarak ayarlamaya oldukça özen gösteriyorum. En azından savunmayı ben çok iyi yapıyorum da oralarda saçma sapan şeylerle karşılaşmıyorum. 5 yıldızlı antrenörler de galiba en çok burada işe yarıyor.

Bir de büyük ligler hariç, özellikle de Türkiye'de sezonlar ilerledikçe yapay zekanın yönettiği takımlarda mali kriz yaşanma durumu var. Bizim yönettiğimiz  takım hariç Türkiye'deki neredeyse diğer bütün takımlar ileriki senelerde finansal olarak batıyor. Sponsor yok, transfer satışından gelir yok, ligden ve Avrupa'dan gelir yok. Bu yüzden birkaç yıl içinde Türkiye'de yönettiğimiz takımla Süper Lig'in içinde bir imparatorluk kurup çok rahat yıllarca şampiyon olunuyor.

Transfer konusuna da hiç girmek istemiyorum ama durum beni zorluyor. Tamam oyuncu satın alması çok basit, ufak tefek araştırmalarla düşük liglerde yüksek profilli ucuz oyuncular bulabiliyorsunuz. Hadi en olmadı transfer listesine bakarak bile işe yarar oyuncular bulabilirsiniz. Fakat ya satması? Oyuncu satışının bu kadar zor olduğu oyun hatırlamıyorum. Özellikle Türkiye’de oynuyorsanız ilk sezonlarda 10-15 milyonun üstünde bir satışın hayalini dahi kurmayın. 3-4 sezon Şampiyonlar Ligi’nde başarı sağlayıp liginizin katsayısını ve takım popülaritenizi yükselttikten sonra şansınız varsa yüksek rakamlı satışlar yaparsınız. 

Oyuncumun değeri 40-50 milyon ama gelen teklif taksitlerle, maddelerle birlikte 35 milyonu geçmiyor. Acaba bu nasıl bi saçmalık? Hayır bir de bu oyuncu gelip kafa ütülüyor "Transferime neden izin vermediniz?" diye. Ulan ibne sana kastımız var ondan satmıyoruz amk. Takımında forma şansı bulamayan oyuncuya tonla para istiyorlar ama bizim gol kralımızın yüzüne bakan yok.

Resmen yine her sene olduğu gibi bu oyunu sadece transfer yaması yükleyip sunmuşlar önümüze ve utanmadan oyunun fiyatını da arttırdılar. Bu oyun bi tutku diyen oyunun fiyatı ne olursa olsun alırım siz ne anlarsınız falan diyen, transfer güncellemesi yüklenip yeni oyun diye sunulan oyuna tapan enayi Football Manager tayfasına bakmayın. Onlar daha yokken ortada ben bu oyunu oynuyordum. O yüzden bu oyunu almayın ve aldırmayın para kazanmasın bu ibneler. FM 2020, FM 2019'dan gram farkı olmayan bi oyun. Eğer 2019 veya bi önceki oyun varsa kütüphanenizde transfer güncellemesini oyuna ekleyip önceki oyunları oynayın.

Not: Ulan bari şu oyunu övmeyin olumlu yorumlar yapmayın. Belki oyunu yapanlar olumlu yorumların düştüğünü falan görünce bi sonraki oyunu düzeltmeye çalışırlar. Yıllardır transfer güncellemesi eklenip sunulan aynı oyuna tapan aptal biatçı Football Manager tayfası yüzünden bu oyun %85 olumlu puan almış. Bu oyunun nesini övüyorsunuz amk?

Not 2: [spoiler]Ananızı götünden sikeyim bu incelemeyi o kadar efendi gibi yazdım. Gitmiş orospu çocukları dün oyuna 20 TL daha zam yapmış. Mayıs ayının ortasında neredeyse yeni oyun çıkacakken oyuna zam geliyor. İlla küfür ettireceksiniz yani sizin sülalenizi sikeyim.[/spoiler]

Not 3:[spoiler] Manchester United logo kullanımı ve lisans yüzünden bu orospu çocuklarını dava etmiş. İnşallah Manchester United ananızı siker. Öyle bi tazminat alır ki yıllardır yaptığınız aynı olan sikik oyunlardan aldığınız fahiş fiyatların hepsini tazminat olarak ödemek zorunda kalırsınız. İnşallah sonra da batarsınız yok olursunuz orospu çocukları SEGA ve Sports Interactive.[/spoiler]

68157143.review:
Благодаря этой игре я узнал, что выход 1 на 1 - это самый мусорный и никчемный момент в футболе. Забить выход 1 на 1 невозможно. Выход 2 в 1 тоже. Хотя я слышал, что у кого-то игрок вышедший с партнером по команде 2 в 1го отдал пас на пустые, но я думаю это вранье (был какой-нибудь рикошет), либо судья посмотрел вар и отменил. Реально опасные голевые моменты это:

1. когда один фланговый полузащитник вешает другому под удар через все поле.
2. когда твой вратарь и защитник начинают распасовку из 10+ пасов, в итоге привозят.
3. когда вратарь оказывается спиной к мячу (например тот залетел к нему за спину и ударился об штангу). он просто перестает видеть мяч и пятится как каракатица.
4. когда одна из команд разводит мяч с центра поля после гола другой.
5. обрез всей команды после идиотского паса в зону, где никого нет.
6. последние минуты таймов (после 85ой минуты я однаждый видел 6 голов, 2-0 превратилось в 6-2)
7. навес со штрафного метров с 35 (это особенно для компа).
8. вратарь бьет в нападающего соперника.
9. если при выходе 1 на 1 нападающий ударил во вратаря, но мяч остановился рядом с воротами. все игроки обороны, включая вратаря, встают и нападающий жопой закатывает его в ворота.

Про всякие унылые подкрутки типа бесконечных 3-0 1-4 в еврокубках и проходам компа по выездным голам я молчу.
Идиотские матчи, когда команда бомжей (с ультра бомжем на воротах, который тащит всё как Буффонище) побеждает нанеся 1 удар по вашим воротам - это уже классика, не было ни одной части, где это работало бы иначе. Если комп на фаворите начинает отставать в чемпионате, а вы играете за андердога, то приготовьте лед, его придется прикладывать к вашему седалищу, когда вас победит ФК Каловые Массы, просто потому что вам нельзя дать сделать отрыв. Поясняю как это работает - у клубов есть скрытый показатель "репутация" и если он низкий, то даже засунув в свой состав редактором Месси и Роналду вы займете 6 место в АПЛ, например. Просто при соотношении ударов 15-1 в вашу пользу вас будут бить 0-1. Гол компуктер забьет со стандарта. Он вообще забивает 90 процентов мячей со стандартов, и неважно, что вы будете делать, хоть все трены на отработку стандартов заточите, хоть в тактике каждого игрока разместите. Навес со штрафного, гол.

Ах да, победить команду с 20го места почти нереально.
Еще теперь не стоит играть внутренний кубок дублем, там даже против слабых команд всегда самый драматичный сценарий, голы на 90ых минутах, серии пенальти. Знакомо? Совпадение? Скрипты...

Всё это очень похоже на реальный футбол.
На самом деле нет.
По-моему в этой части самый помойный набор скриптов, из-за чего кажется, что движок совсем поломанный. Но в той же 17ой он работал. Да что там говорить! Даже в какой-нибудь древней 12ой нападающие забивали выходы 1 на 1 с нормальным процентом.
Понятное дело, если напы будут забивать всё, а слабая команда всегда проигрывать, то человек будет рвать и без того бездарных ИИ-менеджеров (которые не умеют руководить командами ни в одном аспекте, начиная от тактики и заканчивая менеджментом состава и трансферами... они ставят 3-5-2 если у них лучшие крайние защи в чемпе, сажая их в запас, за 5 лет могут купить 1го игрока, а подрать 30, не могут собрать состав под лимит и выпускают по 3 бездаря из молодежки в каждом матче) и в сейве не будет никакой интриги... но можно же как-то подкрутить все так, что бы оно не выглядело убого и не реалистично. Сделайте в движке вероятность самого выхода 1 на 1 низкой, но вероятность забить высокой. Пусть аутсайдеры побеждают исходя из какой-то логики (сменили тренера удачно, настроили игроков, угадали с тактикой или тренер сильной команды допустил просчеты), а не из-за безумного везения. Ну или пусть победы на везении у бомжей случаются 1 раз за сезон, а не в каждом втором матче.

Кто-то скажет - да ты горишь, играть не умеешь! Да нет, я почти все турниры завожу, просто играть противно иногда. После сотни часов (а я играю уже 20 лет) в каждой части ты как будто знаешь, какой скрипт щас будет и интерес падает. В итоге все скатывается к мотанию на холике с фармом трофеев читерской тактикой. Те кто играет честно - мне их жаль, это не стоит нервов и нытья (НУ ПОЧЕМУ, НУ КАК ТАК??? МЫ ЖЕ СТОКА МОМЕНТОВ СОЗДАЛИ!!!!). Понятное дело, что любая подобная игра строится на скриптах, но их же можно настроить гораздо лучше, чем это сделано тут, было бы у разрабов желание.

Всякие фишки типа трен и интервью меняются, но в этом даже разбираться не особо охота. Все быстро надоедает и скидывается на ассистента. Но разрабов реально заклинило на этой фигне и они фиксят и меняют только этот беспонтовый аспект игры.

Скаутинг и поиск игроков еще поменяли. Стало сложнее. Мне, вроде, даже понравилось.

Огрмное количество регенов 180+ потенциала вносят дизбаланс. Хотя большинство из них 169 см карлики на опорниках. На нормальных позициях у них скиллы кривые всегда.

В целом клевых мелочей много. Почти всё что вы хотите сделать будучи тренером команды тут можно сделать, только вот в итоге один фиг кульминацией игры будет этот ужасный 3д матч.

Он, кстати, устарел уже и графически. Пора что-то делать. Игра, мне кажется, много денег зарабатывает и хотелось бы увидеть какой-то шаг вперед. Щас уже как-то всё это совсем плохо выглядит. Да и сам интерфейс. И детали типа лиц регенов (бородатые 15 летние плешивые челы уже утомили). Ну правда, пора уже что-то новое слепить. Движку уже лет 10, причем игра даже хуже стала выглядеть в матче. Не верите? Посмотрите геймплей 2016, например. На газон, на футболистов. Что случилось то, але?

После смерти фифа манагера конкурента у серии нет, она все популярнее (особенно на фоне тотального скатывания футсимов, многие переходят с них на фм), но качество продукта на довольно среднем уровне. То есть нет, играть клево, но хочется наконец сказать "да, вот эта часть ФМа реально хороша", но в последнее время играя в новые фмчики все время думаешь "блин, а ведь фм 20хх был реально лучше".

По сути платим за обновления базы, которую делают добровольные ресерчеры. А разрабы что делают - непонятно.

TLDR: 7.8/10 - WORTH buying, but NOT a MUST BUY.
___

[b]*UPDATE (20/11/19 125hrs played)*[/b] So finished my 5th season with United, I've basically won every trophy this season, however I did get incredibly lucky in the UCL Semis where I beat City on Aggregate 1-0 (with a total of 3shots over 2 games) woops. Did some major changes to my squad, SOLD Pogba, Martial, Maguire, Fred and Costa, to fund my BUYS J Felix, Haaland, Marquinhos, Aouar, R Neves and Donnarumma. Massive changes to structure, but hope things go well in my 6th season. (After this season, i'm starting a fresh save)

Despite my steam hours being limited, trust me, I've collected more than 1,500hrs in each FM that comes out each year(from fm10-19) (Yea probably need a life).

Pros:
+ Development Centre (very interesting)
+ Tactics depth increased
+ Board expectation and happiness depth increase
+ SLIGHTLY improved AI and sims.
+ Staff information slight change, but gives a nice feel
+ Better interactions and fluidity in managing the team
+ ***Expect the same as you've always gotten (more or less)

Cons:
- No game changing updates
- Nothing ground breaking
- Match Engine still far from 'Perfect'
- 3D Rendering of your face is still crap
- PES has ruined Juventus (but just wait for the usual Workshop fixes)
- ***Expect the same as you've always gotten (more or less)

I mean, I buy the game in support of the developers for all the years and hours of fun it's given me. So i've already grown to know what to expect as each year goes by. Its the same game, its just refreshed, squads updated, and some small nice additions. The development center seems to be a very nice addition to the game, however i'm not deep enough into the game to warrant a full conclusion on how it really performs. 

This year they've done a decent job in sorting the game out, nothing ground breaking, nothing overzealous, just simple and what you need. Look, this year its again a simple facelift plus some. The addition of a handful of small new features, and the big addition of the development center, its good. Thats it. Expect the game to be as how it always has been.

However I believe there is an issue with one-on-ones at the moment, seem to miss too many or hit them directly at the keeper. Maybe its just my poor forwards, no clue, have to keep monitoring.

POST-BETA Changes, are really minute, match engine tweaks have been a LITTLE BIT better, but still far from perfect. Still dislike the 1-on-1 failures and shooting from impossible acute angles. But its better than the start of BETA.

Verdict:
7.8/10 Its good as always, but nothing that jumps at you as a MUST BUY series. Good game as always nonetheless.

Thanks if you managed to read this far.

56551553.review:
[h1][b]Le novità sono pochine ma il prodotto resta solido[/b][/h1]

Le novità più interessanti riguardano il piano di sviluppo quinquennale, dove la società ci valuterà in base a precisi paletti legati sia ai risultati sportivi che altri fattori (reputazione del club, ampliamento dello stadio, ecc...); e la visione del club, che amplia il precedente concetto di filosofia preferita (in passato limitata solo al modo di giocare) e riflette le volontà del presidente del team (es. comprare giocatori giovani, comprare stelle già affermate, ecc...).
L'aspetto interessante è che questi paletti cambiano in base alla squadra scelta da noi giocatori, e riflettono quelle che sono le varie realtà calcistiche, aumentando così il grado di empatia verso i vari progetti che il giocatore deciderà di portare avanti.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=9q6bm4UyVNs

La creazione delle tattiche è rimasta invariata, ci sono le stesse istruzioni presenti in FM19, e possono essere persino spostati i vecchi file tattici di FM19 in FM20. Qui vi lascio un video sulla mia tattica del 433 con cui l'anno scorso ho vinto tutto:

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=jHbiZgjsKtg&t=39s

Questo modulo che vi ho postato mi ha fatto vincere una valanga di challenge, tra cui la famosa VVV che ho riportato come sintesi in quest'altro video:

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=pzSH91BVUFQ

In definitiva io lo consiglio ma spero che venga alzata la frequenza dei gol in "uno contro uno" col portiere, perchè gli attaccanti, almeno per ora, continuano a sbagliare troppo; mentre i tiri da lontano, soprattutto dei terzini fluidificanti sembrano quest'anno OP.

PS: se siete curiosi, potete trovarmi anche su twitch (canale: LucullusGames), vado online ogni sera alle 20:30 sempre e solo con FM20.

Açık ve net konuşacağım. Oyunda prestijli ligler hariç (İngiltere, Almanya vs.) diğer liglerde her seferinde takımlar yıllar ilerledikçe finansal olarak batmaya başlıyorlar. Hadi ben insanım, wonderkid felan alıp satarak takımı mali olarak güvende tutarım... Fakat yapay zeka? Yapay zekanın yönettiği takımlar gelir gider dengesini sağlayamıyor ve işin korkunç yanı oyunda 10 ila 20 sezon oynadıktan sonra prestijli ligler hariç (Almanya, Fransa, İngiltere vb.) diğer liglerdeki takımların mali durumu "kayyumda" veya "güvensiz" oluyor. Sponsor gelirleri felan katiyen kurtarmıyor. Oyunda acilen ligde verilen para ödülüne dinamik bir mekanik getirmek gerek. Ligde 1. 2. 3. 4. ...... bitirince ödül olarak verilen para sabit olmamalı! Ligin itibarı arttıkça, alınan para miktarı dinamik bir şekilde artmalı. Örneğin İsveç ligi. İsveç ligini kaliteli ligler sıralamasında 23. sırada olarak varsayalım ve ligdeki para ödüllerinde 1. bitiren takıma 900.000$ verildiğini varsayalım. Ve İsveç liginin ligler sıralamasında 23. sıradan 15. sıraya yükseldiğini varsayalım. Bu durumda 1. bitiren takıma verilen para yine sabit olarak 900.000$ olmamalı. Ligin itibarı arttığı için bu para dinamik olarak artmalı. Örneğin % olarak artabilir. Ligler sıralamasında 23. sıradan 15. sıraya yükseldiğini varsaydığımız İsveç ligini 1. bitiren takıma verilen para ödülü 900.000$ %15 arttırılabilir.

Özetle: Oyunda kar ve zarar dengesinde, zarar her zaman daha fazla oluyor. Eğer ligde verilen para ödülü iyi değil ise, takımlar zaman geçtikçe batmaya başlıyorlar... Buna acilen bir çözüm getirilmesi gerek. Sadece İngiliz, Alman, Fransız...... ligleri ve takımları zengin olmamalı. İşin saçma kısmını açıklayayım. İngiltere liginde verilen para ödülü sabit olduğundan dolayı İngiltere ligi, lig sıralamasında sonuncu bile olsa (Dünyanın en kalitesiz liginin İngiltere ligi olduğunu varsayalım) yinede 1. bitiren takıma verilen para ödülü sabit olduğu için İngiliz takımları asla batmayacak. Her zaman zengin olacaklar. Yani oyunda bir mucize olsa ve İngiltere ligi sıralamada sonuncu sıraya bile yerleşse, para ödülü dinamik olmadığından ötürü 1. olan takım 200M$ alacak. (200M$ para ödülünü örnek olarak söyledim. Para ödülünün ne kadar olduğunu hatırlamıyorum.) Kısacası Lig sıralamasında ligin itibarı düşerse, verilen para miktarı % olarak düşürülebilir. Aynı şekilde eğer bir lig sıralamada yükselirse, verilen para ödülü % olarak artmalı.

61096176.review:
This is the fastest I'm dropping an FM game, and by a MILE. 29 hours might not seem like much but for someone who has thousands and thousands of hours combined between previous editions going back to Championship Manager 4, it was enough.

The game looked so promising, giving you control over more things than ever, with some little, sometimes unnecessary, but cool touches... in the end it delivers on most promises bar one, the crucial aspect - the match engine. That one doesn't seem like you can control it AT ALL.

Most people have already talked about how there's just a lot of insane balls played over the top from your defenders, or the conversion rate of 1-on-1's, and it's all true.

[b]I have never felt less control over the matches in a Football Manager than in 2020.[/b] And it's not even close to the 2nd worst one.

I guess many things worked flawlessly, and for that the team can take full credit. You've lured me in. Even with limited time I've decided to come back to the franchise after two years, so kudos to the marketing team. 
 The general feel of the UI is quite good. Opting for a lot of visual elements in some screens (training, responsibilities) instead of keeping it simple got messy, but it's not a big deal.

Basically the vast majority of the game is fine, except for... the game itself. The match engine just doesn't cut it, and while I don't believe that's the case, it literally feels like it was an afterthought this year. To the extent that I wouldn't be surprised if someone told me this engine was created from scratch in like 100 hours.

The match engine doesn't feel like you can affect the outcome, your team does the same things for the most part regardless of the instructions... The game gave me no joy, even when winning. I wasn't winning. My team wasn't playing the way I wanted. The majority of goals scored had nothing to do with the style of play my tactics were using.

It felt like spending half an hour to polish a coin before a coin toss, thinking it would affect the outcome.

I'm genuinely sad writing this review because I've always loved the franchise and I had high hopes. Perhaps too high and unjustified, but even at FM's worst points the game didn't disappoint me to such an extent.

61424961.review:
Everything apart from the matches is superb, best FM ever. 

The match engine is fundamentally broken - too easy to split a defence open with a long ball resulting in a one-on-one, so SI nerfed the conversion rates of one-on-one chances to keep scorelines acceptable. The result however, is that your world class  striker misses 2-5 easy chances every game. 

Wingers do not square the ball for strikers, instead preferring to shoot from obscenely acute angles rather than play the ball across the box. 

Half the crowd is a repeated man in an orange jumper. This may sound minor but it's really immersion breaking once you notice it. You can be a team that plays in blue, and yet over 50% of the crowd are dressed in orange. It diminishes the match experience and detracts from the game as a whole.

It's crap like this, broken for 2 months now, I've bought every game in this series since the year 2000, I pre-order every year (literally the only game I will do so with) and said I'll continue to do so until I get burned. Well, SI Games, you've broken me at last. The 'Bugs' section of your forum is littered with these issues that are "under review", well you can consider my purchase of FM 2021 in the same category.

Edit: I played a bunch more because apparently I'm a masochist. The match engine is total cack and has regressed massively since FM 2017. Don't waste your money - take up a more enjoyable pastime such as jamming needles in your eyes, you'll thank me for it.

57530750.review: Every year we see improvements here and there, this year that's not an exception. Although still far from perfect, the 3D engine and graphics were improved, small tweaks through out the entire game and interface, more tactical response from the players in the pitch, improved relationships and the biggest focus for this new edition: The youth prospects and the future of your club and carreer. It's fair to, somehow, say that this new edition is "more of the same", but in the end it's refreshing and its changes are enough to renew our desire and hunger to keep playing year after year this amazing game. I play since the very first edition back in the 90's, every year I spend long hours playing. I was a teenager by that time and I'm a 41 years old married father today. I never get fed up of this game, no matter what.

60825488.review:
Je n'ai pas envie de cliquer Oui ou Non, je suis indécis. Pour la première fois je vais donner un avis ici alors que je suis un très ancien joueur qui a connu bien des opus. Alors, pour un ancien joueur qui a passé des centaines d'heures sur ce jeu en plusieurs années (en même temps j'oublie souvent de déconnecter le jeu, donc ce temps passé est tout relatif) je peux dire que c'est un jeu chiant et passionnant à la fois. Chiant, parce que parfois la gestion du club et l'équipe n'est pas toujours très fun au point que ça devient même parfois très rébarbatif et lassant, on dirait parfois plus un logiciel professionnel qu'un jeu, chiant aussi parce que les "causeries" jouent à mon humble avis un rôle trop important sur le moral de l'équipe. On perd trop facilement pour une mauvaise causerie ou un mauvais choix en conférence de presse. Ca me parait usurper la réalité comme si les joueurs étaient de véritables éponges psychologiques et que quelques paroles suffisaient à influencer leur volonté. Ca me parait quelque peu abusé. Chiant parce que contre les grosses écuries comme le PSG par exemple tout semble configurer pour qu'elle soit surhumaine alors que même s'ils sont très bons, ils ont aussi leur faiblesse, même contre une équipe plus faible. Bref, le fun devrait se situer dans les combinaisons tactiques. Mais ça devient tellement obscur que parfois, on est sur une pente ascendante (enfin on croit l'être) et d'un seul coup l'équipe se met à perdre sans raisons apparentes. Bref, au bout du compte ça devient tellement complexe de "configurer sa tactique" même avec les tactiques préconstruites à disposition, et même si l'on conserve la tactique longtemps, et même si on essaie de prendre la plus proche possible des aptitudes des joueurs, on finit par perdre encore une fois pour des raisons très obscures. Donc réalisme ou pas ? Je n'en sais rien. Au bout du compte, je finis par être un entraineur en vacances qui ne participe plus qu'aux périodes de recrutement, et encore, parfois je repars en vacances pour laisser faire mon staff qui finalement se débrouille très bien sans moi. Aussi, pour finir, je me demande pourquoi je joue puisque finalement le jeu simule très bien tout sans que j'ai vraiment besoin d'intervenir. J'ai plus l'impression au bout du compte d'être le Président du club que le coach d'une équipe. Enfin, voilà, lassant au bout de trois saisons ou rien n'évolue vraiment, les possibilités de progresser sont devenues vraiment très complexes. Réalisme peut-être, fun, de moins en moins... Pourtant j'aime toujours ce jeu même si j'y prends de moins en moins de plaisir. Bref, je finis par ne plus y croire du tout. Passionnant, ça le fut longtemps, lorsque je découvrais grace à ce jeu quelques subtilités tactiques du football même si au bout du compte, pour faire grimper un club, il suffisait de se doter de jeunes joueurs, de les habituer à jouer ensemble très longtemps pour qu'ils deviennent après quelques années presque imbattables. En bref, je ne sais plus quoi penser vraiment de la "sincérité" du jeu si je puis dire, usurpation scénarisée ou réalisme complexe, je ne sais plus trop...
Je rejoindrai aussi des critiques que j'ai pu lire, parfois les joueurs adverses font des ouvertures incroyables qui devraient être "hors jeu", j'ai pris des buts avec un attaquant 10 mètres derrière ma ligne de défense. Bref, trop de buts sur des passes à la limite du hors-jeu alors même que dans la réalité ces buts sont beaucoup plus rares. Si je choisis une tactique plus défensive, je me retrouver à prendre encore plus de buts parce que forcément les joueurs adverses profitent de ma position en retrait. Bref, quelque soit la tactique adoptée, ça finit par des catastrophes. D'autre part, selon la tactique adverse il faudrait passer des heures à chercher la bonne parade, ou la bonne tactique qui "marche" donc en "trichant" (sauvegarde, recharger, recommencer, etc.) jusqu'à enfin gagner le match. Pas fun du tout... donc entre le réalisme impossible à atteindre, et le fun, je pense que les développeurs devraient choisir le fun... Mais je crois que ça devient impossible à concevoir, le jeu est devenu soit trop complexe, soit trop invraissemblable, je ne sais plus trop quoi penser...

59485265.review: Each edition of FM stands or falls with its match engine, and 2020 is unfortunately one of the poorest entries in that regard. The problems in the vanilla version have already been covered in many reviews, and hoping that the most recent update had improved things, I gave it another spin. The outcomes are no longer quite as absurd as they used to be, but still miles from acceptable. World-class forwards waste chance after chance, goalkeepers win pretty much every one-on-one, and most goals come from standards. There are some interesting UI updates and streamlining of various sections that are an improvement over earlier editions, but the constant match day frustration makes this one an inferior entry over its last few predecessors.

59265584.review:
Короткая рецензия: вас ждет разочарование...

Если все эти годы вы ждали прорыва в серии, то вы перепутали иргу.
Если все это время вы верили в планомерный рост и развитие серии, то вы, вероятно, увлекающийся мечтатель.
Если вы (как и я) просто надеялись на то, что создателям серии год от года будет хотя бы просто не по*** на это все, то я вас поздравляю. Вам пора повзрослеть.

Страшно сказать, моей первой игрой в симулятор фут.менеджера был... Football World Manager 2000. Залипал в него круче, чем в фифу и прочие старкрафты. В развитии самого жанра за эти почти 20 лет было множество приятных памяти вех. Один только переход на 3D движок, помнится, знатно взорвал мне мозг. Но сейчас...

Сейчас создается такое впечатление, что мы наблюдаем уже даже не стагнацию, а настоящий регресс серии. Игроделы либо сознательно отказались от обратной связи с потребителем, либо просто глухи. Хотите инноваций в геймлплэй? Да/Нет - неважно. FM, возможно, та игра в которой стоит придерживаться принципа программиста - не чини то, что работает. Проблема только в том, что FM работает все хуже и хуже. 

Я не знаю, кому это должно быть более заметно. Новичкам или ветеранам. Но сами матчи в 2020 со всем их багами и косяками превратились в настоящее наказание. Как? Объясните, как можно получать удовольствие от подписания топового форварда, если ты уже предвидишь, что он будет реализовывать 1 выход один-в-один из 10? Зачем выстраивать игру через центр, если в половине матчей ситуацию на поле будут решать бешеные латерали, раз за разом прибегающие в чужую штрафную. И ладно бы они выполняли после этого навес или прострел. Они же просто лупят по воротам! С нулевых углов! Полностью игнорируя форвардов в штрафной. 

Короче. FM всегда была игрой способной попортить вам нервы. Просто раньше в этом чувствовался баланс. Баланс, который присутствует и в настоящей тренерской работе: ты можешь влиять на происходящее на поле, но не можешь на поле выйти сам. А сейчас при игре я ловлю себя на мысли, что логика происходящего сломана, связи порваны, а вместо команды (виртуальных, но все-таки) спортсменов-людей мне в команду отсыпали 11 роботов-пылесосов со сломанной системой навигации.

Оценка: 3 забитых пенальти из 10. Если не будет зимнего фикса, то FM21 я не куплю.

56069039.review:
[h1] 正式版测评[/h1]
正式版上线后买了核武进游戏体验了一下，相较于BETA版，改动和更新体现在：
第一，现有球员中文翻译修正，除了吴蕾以外，19版本中的郑直也修正为了郑智；但一些新生成球员的姓名依然错乱，需要手动更改。
第二，在最新一次的BETA版更新后，运行游戏有明显卡顿，正式版中稍有缓解，动画掉帧率降低。
第三，单刀成功率依然很低，但是禁区内的传接球更加真实化了。进入禁区后不再是回传、射门或者踢到防守球员身上，开始学会放慢节奏、假动作过人和禁区内分球给空位或插上的队友。

总体来说，挤牙膏式的更新方式与不痛不痒的游戏性提升会让一些玩家感到与价格升值之间的落差。对于许多玩家提出的主席模式，我认为实现的可能性不高，因为俱乐部所有人和经理人之间的职责和工作差距较大。让玩家同时成为主席、经理人无疑让这款游戏更加复杂。或许，可以让经理人用工资去雇更好的助理，添加一些个人助理的职能（例如和球员经纪人之间的关系）。


[h1] BETA版测评[/h1]

著名年货换皮数据库足球模拟经营游戏FM2020在万众(?)呼声中提前了几天释出了BETA版供预购玩家抢先体验。

以下是2020版主要的更新内容：

第一，图像优化；主教练、球员的脸部的确有了部分改观，但依然很丑，而且人物模型如此之小，所以这一更新的成效几乎不可见。

第二，发展中心；原本的梯队栏目被统合进了一个完整的新元素“发展中心”当中，小牛们的培养其实是本代作品最大的革新之处。首先，简介的报告窗口区分了U23和U18两大板块，并且清晰地标识出队伍中具有优秀潜力的小牛目前的数量，汇总关于球员最新训练和比赛进展的核心讯息。其次，球探们会为小牛做出一个分等级的评价：最优秀、球星、优异、不错等等。玩家可以一目了然地获悉可能对应的PA数值。另外，小牛们的成长历程不再是原来的定期汇报，而改变为可视化的线行趋势图。总体来说，本作在将青训复杂化的同时尽可能地用视觉化的方式让玩家操控。

第三，多年度球员定位；在前几作当中，球员合同只会要求玩家给出当下的球员角色（例如希望之星、年轻球员、替补、轮换、核心等）。本作则创新性地将这一定位转变为多年度的长期规划，例如小牛的合同可以变成希望之星+应急替补+边缘球员。

第四，俱乐部愿景及职员变化；本作更加细化了俱乐部对于经理人的要求和愿景，并将所有的比赛、资金、转会等等重要元素都以可视化的图形加以区分，俱乐部对于经理人的满意度也修改为评级（A+/-，B+/-等）。职员在原有的基础上增加了租借经理和技术总监。

第五，其他变化。增加了一开始的任职画面，裁判VR不用再跑到场边浪费时间了，草皮真实度、射门和扑救真实度增加。前几作的伤病诟病在目前的BETA版中并不明显，看来是有意完善过了。

当然，历代都存在的缺点，在目前的BETA版中还是基本都能找到。例如天价小牛转会费，较高的点球判定和较高的扑点成功率，中文人名翻译错误等。

56570767.review:
作为专职玩足球经理的主播，已经来到了第四年了，每个版本最低都1900+个小时，相信也能证明我对它的爱了。
2020本来也确实没有过多期待，也避免失望。不过实际情况的增强却意外的还不错。（PS：试玩版问题实在太多了。。我只说优点吧）
1.训练增加了传中盘带头球等训练终于让训练回归正常，这点19版本相信提过无数意见了，这点给个加分，但更像是完善19的不足；
2.貌似是终于开启了CPU多核运算，极大的加快了比赛之间过时间的等待时间，这点必须大大加分！就单单这点就值得购入；
3.寻求更好更出色的画面引擎也能看出SI不断进取的想法（当然实际尝试效果暂时比较多问题），相信之后正式版会逐步完善；
4.战术边锋位置增加了内切型边锋，这样让可边可切的全能边路球员终于有了发挥的办法，相比较之前的选项基本都是有所缺陷的；
5.更多人性化的选择，职责的直接绑定主教练就得到了极大的好评，像我做主播经常要换球队，不用再每次根据自己的习惯重新选择一次，比较浪费时间而且厌烦；
6.小牛成长变得更直观，再也不是二队就没有关注了，这代的青训中心总结我认为还是比较接近现实的，也让球员成长的乐趣得到了放大。
7.界面大改，增加很多帅气现代化的条条框框，也将设置区域重做等等都证明了SI想进取的心，只是增加了老玩家重新适应的成本，但相信会更多改善。
试玩到现在大概的一些心得，逐步相信更多的想法。有兴趣的可以来斗鱼看我~房间号539441
也欢迎来Q群交流~521796264 各种资源分享都有，我用的基本都可以找到，还有一群大神教导~

73925601.review:
Honestly it's football manager and I like football manager; if you do as well you'll like this. The negative review is because there is little effort put into the series, FM has been little more than a roster update with minor tweaks. Just compare it to out of the park baseball which completely blows it out of the water. In comparison this looks like a budget title but it isn't. About the only things FM does better is scouting and the 3D looks better. It's getting a little boring that there's never any real additions.

Ootp has you start at any time with the rosters and rules of that time with the players emerging and rules been added as time goes on. Customise the rules. Create new leagues with new teams easily with an easy way to give them logos and jerseys. Adding custom jerseys and logos is much easier in general you could easily change them out every year if you wanted. Put players of every era in so for example want pele and zidane in 2020 go ahead. Feel you can have a much bigger impact on the match with tactics and choices though this is partly because baseball is easier to do that for than football. A match engine that makes sense and works. It runs considerably faster and better they also call their skip a skip instead of a holiday. Even something as minor as the facegen is better. What have we gotten in FM? Tweets and press interviews :).

I'd like them to add something major for once but have a feeling this review will probably be as relevant to FM 2025 and 2030 as this one :/.
